name: Dots n Lines | Construct 3 Template | No Coding Knowledge required
name_original: Dots n Lines | Construct 3 Template | No Coding Knowledge required
description:
Download Dots n Lines (Dots and Boxes) game template for Construct 3. Contains admob integration, you will just need to update the global variables.

You can use this as a separate or part of a project.
No coding knowledge required.
Easy to use.
Export to Android, iOS, Web and desktop platforms with just one click.

Download folder contains 

1. Construct 3 project file

2. Documentation text file

3. Guidelines with Screenshots

Video demo - https://youtu.be/lvEuF_uIyEg

Two game modes with 5 levels

1. Single player with AI
2. Local multiplayer

For any upgrades or feedback, please write to contact@shepherd.games
